marno.protocol

Interface RMIClientInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIClient

    public interface RMIClientInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The RMI interface implemented by RMI clients.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ping()
      Pings the client.
      void sendHistory(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> history)
      Sends a history of old messages the server had received.
      void sendMessage(java.lang.String date, java.lang.String message)
      Relays a public message to the client.
      void sendPrivateMessage(java.lang.String date, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String message)
      Relays a private message to the client from another user.
      void sendUserList(java.lang.String[] users)
      Sends a list of users currently connected to the RMI server.

    • Method Detail

      • ping

        void ping()
   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Pings the client.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

        void sendHistory(java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.String> history)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends a history of old messages the server had received.
        Parameters:
        history - the list of messages
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

      • sendMessage

        void sendMessage(java.lang.String date,
                 java.lang.String message)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Relays a public message to the client.
        Parameters:
        date - the date on which the message was received
        message - the contents of the message
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

      • sendPrivateMessage

        void sendPrivateMessage(java.lang.String date,
                        java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String message)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Relays a private message to the client from another user.
        Parameters:
        date - the date on which the message was received
        username - the username of the sender of the message
        message - the contents of the message
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred

      • sendUserList

        void sendUserList(java.lang.String[] users)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Sends a list of users currently connected to the RMI server.
        Parameters:
        users - a list of users currently connected to the server
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an error occurred
